name: M16A4
details: A versatile rifle with burst and single fire modes, suited for mid-range combat.

name: M416
details: Highly customizable and effective for both close and mid-range combat.

name: SCAR-L
details: A reliable assault rifle with moderate damage and recoil, ideal for mid-range.

name: G36C
details: A compact and powerful assault rifle favored for its accuracy and rate of fire.

name: QBZ95
details: A Chinese assault rifle known for its stability and effectiveness in combat.

name: K2
details: A modern South Korean assault rifle that excels in accuracy and handling.

name: AUG
details: An Austrian bullpup rifle known for its compact design and excellent ergonomics.

name: FAMAS
details: A French bullpup rifle that offers a high rate of fire, suited for close-quarters combat.

name: AKM
details: A powerful assault rifle known for its high damage and effectiveness at long range.

name: M762
details: A versatile rifle with high damage output, effective for both mid and long-range combat.

name: MK47
details: A hybrid assault rifle that performs well in various combat scenarios.

name: GROZA
details: A unique assault rifle that offers high firepower and is favored in close combat.

name: ACE32
details: A modern assault rifle that balances rate of fire and damage, suitable for various combat situations.

name: Stun Grenade
details: A tactical explosive device that disorients and temporarily incapacitates enemies with a blinding flash.

name: Frag Grenade
details: Designed to cause damage through fragmentation, effective for clearing rooms.

name: Molotov Cocktail
details: An incendiary device that ignites on impact, spreading flames over a designated area.

name: Sticky Bomb
details: Adheres to surfaces and detonates after a short delay, ideal for ambushes.

name: Smoke Grenade
details: Releases a thick cloud of smoke upon detonation for visual concealment.

name: C4
details: A high-powered explosive that can be detonated remotely, effective against vehicles and structures.

name: BZ Grenade
details: A chemical agent used to incapacitate enemies, causing disorientation and confusion.

name: Decoy Grenade
details: A tactical device that emits sound and light to simulate gunfire and distract enemies.

name: Kar98
details: A bolt-action sniper rifle, known for its high damage and long-range precision.

name: Mosin Nagant
details: A bolt-action sniper rifle, similar in performance to the Kar98k, excelling in long-range combat.

name: M24
details: A high-powered bolt-action sniper rifle, prized for its superior range and damage.

name: AWM
details: A powerful bolt-action sniper rifle, renowned for its unmatched damage and long-range accuracy.

name: Win94
details: A lever-action marksman rifle, known for its unique iron sights and high accuracy.

name: AMR
details: A devastating semi-automatic sniper rifle, designed to penetrate vehicles and heavy armor.

name: Tommy Gun
details: Tommy Gun (Thompson Submachine Gun) - A classic submachine gun known for its high rate of fire and iconic design. Chambered in .45 ACP, it excels in close-quarters combat, delivering significant firepower and accuracy.

name: UMP45
details: UMP45 - A versatile submachine gun known for its balanced performance and ease of use. Chambered in .45 ACP, it offers a good mix of accuracy and stopping power, making it effective in close to medium-range engagements.

name: Micro UZI
details: Micro UZI - A compact and lightweight submachine gun, known for its high rate of fire and maneuverability. Chambered in 9mm, it excels in close-quarters combat, delivering rapid fire and quick follow-up shots.

name: Vector
details: Vector - A lightweight submachine gun renowned for its low recoil and high rate of fire. Chambered in .45 ACP, it offers excellent accuracy and handling, making it a formidable choice for close to medium-range engagements.

name: PP-19 Bizon
details: PP-19 Bizon - A unique submachine gun featuring a bullpup design and a distinctive horizontal magazine. Chambered in 9mm, it offers a high-capacity magazine and impressive rate of fire, making it effective for close-quarters combat.

name: MP5K
details: MP5K - A compact variant of the iconic MP5 submachine gun, designed for close-quarters engagements. Chambered in 9mm, it combines a high rate of fire with excellent maneuverability, making it ideal for tactical operations and personal defense.

name: MP9
details: MP9 - A lightweight and compact submachine gun, designed for versatility and ease of handling. Chambered in 9mm, it features a high rate of fire and low recoil, making it effective for close-quarters combat and tactical scenarios.

name: P90
details: P90 - A futuristic personal defense weapon known for its compact size and high-capacity magazine. Chambered in 5.7×28mm, it offers a unique bullpup design and a high rate of fire, making it effective for close-quarters combat and versatile tactical use.

name: JS9
details: JS9 - A reliable and versatile submachine gun, designed for modern tactical applications. Chambered in 9mm, it offers a lightweight frame and a high rate of fire, making it effective for close to medium-range engagements.

name: S12k
details: S12K - A semi-automatic shotgun known for its versatility in close-quarters combat. Chambered for 12-gauge shells, it delivers significant stopping power and fast follow-up shots, making it an effective choice for engaging enemies at close range.

name: S1897
details: S1897 - A classic pump-action shotgun renowned for its reliability and powerful stopping power. Chambered for 12-gauge shells, it excels in close-quarters combat, delivering devastating impact with each shot.

name: S686
details: S686 - A double-barrel shotgun known for its elegance and high stopping power. Chambered for 12-gauge shells, it offers rapid follow-up shots with two rounds and is highly effective in close-quarters engagements.

name: DBS
details: DBS - A double-barreled shotgun that combines the firepower of two shots with a unique design. Chambered for 12-gauge shells, it excels in close-quarters combat, delivering devastating damage with each trigger pull.

name: Sawed Off
details: Sawed Off Shotgun - A compact and powerful firearm, modified for increased maneuverability in close-quarters combat. Chambered for 12-gauge shells, it delivers a wide spread of shot, making it highly effective at short range.

name: O12
details: O12 - A semi-automatic shotgun known for its high rate of fire and versatility. Chambered for 12-gauge shells, it offers quick follow-up shots and significant stopping power, making it ideal for close-quarters engagements.

name: Machete
details: Machete - A large, bladed tool traditionally used for cutting through dense vegetation, but also effective as a close-combat weapon. Its heavy blade delivers powerful strikes, making it a versatile tool for survival and self-defense situations.

name: Pan
details: DPan - A cast-iron frying pan known for its surprising durability in combat situations. Not only is it an effective melee weapon, delivering blunt force damage, but its solid construction also provides protection, capable of deflecting bullets when equipped on the back.

name: Sickle
details: Sickle - A curved, hand-held agricultural tool traditionally used for harvesting, but also effective as a close-combat weapon. Its sharp blade allows for swift, slashing attacks, making it a versatile option for self-defense in close-quarters combat.

name: Pickaxe
details: Pickaxe - A sturdy tool with a pointed tip and a flat blade, traditionally used for breaking hard ground or rocks. In combat, its heavy and robust design makes it a powerful melee weapon capable of delivering strong, crushing blows.

name: P18C
details: P18C - A versatile semi-automatic pistol known for its compact design and reliability. Chambered in 9mm, it features a high-capacity magazine and is effective for close-quarters combat, making it a popular choice for personal defense and tactical use.

name: P92
details: P92 - A reliable semi-automatic pistol known for its ergonomic design and accuracy. Chambered in 9mm, it offers a smooth trigger pull and good magazine capacity, making it effective for personal defense and tactical applications.

name: P1911
details: P1911 - An iconic semi-automatic pistol known for its durability and stopping power. Chambered in .45 ACP, it features a classic design and a crisp trigger, making it a popular choice for both personal defense and competitive shooting.

name: Skorpion
details: Skorpion - A compact submachine gun known for its lightweight design and high rate of fire. Chambered in 9mm, it excels in close-quarters combat, delivering rapid fire and effective performance in tactical situations.

name: R45
details: R45 - A robust revolver known for its reliability and powerful performance. Chambered in .45 ACP, it combines a classic design with solid stopping power, making it suitable for personal defense and tactical use.

name: Deagle
details: Desert Eagle (Deagle) - A powerful semi-automatic pistol known for its distinctive design and high stopping power. Chambered in .50 AE or .44 Magnum, it delivers exceptional firepower, making it a formidable choice for both enthusiasts and tactical applications.

name: R1895
details: R1895 - A classic revolver known for its historical significance and reliability. Chambered in .44 Russian, it features a robust design and is effective for close-range engagements, making it a favored choice among collectors and enthusiasts.

name: M249
details: M249 - A lightweight, belt-fed machine gun renowned for its high rate of fire and versatility on the battlefield. Chambered in 5.56×45mm NATO, it provides sustained fire support, making it ideal for both squad and vehicle-mounted operations.

name: DP-28
details: DP-28 - A Soviet light machine gun known for its unique design and reliability. Chambered in 7.62×54mmR, it features a distinctive top-mounted pan magazine with a capacity of 47 rounds. The DP-28 excels in providing sustained fire support and is effective in medium-range engagements.

name: MG3
details: MG3 - A versatile and powerful general-purpose machine gun, known for its high rate of fire and durability. Chambered in 7.62×51mm NATO, it offers a belt-fed ammunition system, allowing for sustained fire in various tactical situations, making it ideal for both mounted and dismounted roles.

name: Crossbow
details: Crossbow - A ranged weapon that uses a horizontal limb system to shoot projectiles called bolts. Known for its stealth and precision, it is effective for silent takedowns and can penetrate armor, making it a versatile choice for tactical situations.

name: Mortar
details: Mortar - A portable, indirect-fire weapon designed to launch explosive shells at a high angle. It is effective for delivering heavy firepower against enemy positions and fortifications, making it a valuable asset for artillery support in both offensive and defensive operations.

name: Panzerfaust
details: Panzerfaust - A portable, shoulder-fired anti-tank weapon used to deliver a powerful explosive charge against armored vehicles. Known for its effectiveness in close combat, it is a valuable asset for infantry in tactical scenarios.

name: Stun Gun
details: Stun Gun - A non-lethal self-defense device that delivers a high-voltage shock to incapacitate an attacker temporarily. It is designed for personal protection, causing muscle contractions and disorientation, making it an effective tool for deterring threats without causing permanent harm.

name: M79
details: M79 - A single-shot, break-action grenade launcher known for its effectiveness in delivering explosive rounds at range. Chambered for 40mm grenades, it is lightweight and portable, making it ideal for supporting infantry in close-quarters and medium-range engagements.

name: Mini14
details: Mini-14 - A lightweight and versatile semi-automatic rifle, known for its reliability and accuracy. Chambered in 5.56×45mm NATO, it excels in medium-range engagements, making it suitable for a variety of tactical applications.

name: Qbu88
details: QBU88 - A lightweight, semi-automatic designated marksman rifle, designed for precision shooting. Chambered in 5.8×42mm, it offers a balance of firepower and accuracy, making it effective for medium to long-range engagements.

name: Mk12
details: Mk12 - A highly adaptable designated marksman rifle known for its accuracy and versatility. Chambered in 5.56×45mm NATO, it features a precision barrel and various attachments, making it effective for both short and long-range engagements.

name: SKS
details: SKS - A semi-automatic carbine known for its reliability and rugged design. Chambered in 7.62×39mm, it combines moderate recoil with effective stopping power, making it suitable for medium-range engagements and a favorite among collectors and enthusiasts.

name: SLR
details: SLR (Self-Loading Rifle) - A semi-automatic rifle based on the AK-47 platform, known for its durability and powerful performance. Chambered in 7.62×51mm NATO, it offers significant stopping power and accuracy, making it effective for a variety of tactical situations.

name: Mk14
details: Mk14 - A versatile designated marksman rifle, known for its accuracy and adaptability. Chambered in 7.62×51mm NATO, it can be configured for both semi-automatic and automatic fire, making it effective for medium to long-range engagements.

name: VSS
details: VSS Vintorez - A suppressed sniper rifle known for its stealth and precision. Chambered in 9×39mm, it features an integral suppressor, making it ideal for covert operations and silent engagements at medium range.

name: Dragunov
details: Dragunov - A semi-automatic sniper rifle renowned for its accuracy and effective range. Chambered in 7.62×54mmR, it combines high stopping power with a lightweight design, making it suitable for both designated marksman roles and long-range engagements.
